website_summaries.verdict: This well-known laxative works relatively quickly, but some may find the side effects a bit overwhelming.
pros: Relief from severe constipation when other methods haven't worked
cons: May experience cramping and excessively powerful bowel movements

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: box says you can take 2 -3 pills at once .. DO NOT TAKE 3 . I REPEAT DO NOT TAKE 3
customer_reviews.author: Molly1

customer_reviews.title: Quality Poopin
customer_reviews.text: Alright, y'all. I've single handedly finished my box and, so far, this brand has been the most effective at doing it's job. I take 3 before bedtime, let it steep overnight, then drain the swamp within an hour of waking up. Sometimes I cramp, sometimes I don't. Be sure to drink plenty of water when you take it -- the more, the better -- which is essential for the best performance (and oh boy what a performance it will be), and more after to stay hydrated. Highly recommended. Good luck and godspeed, ha!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Food poisoning couldn’t have been worse.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it one star I would. I took it because it said it was gentle. I thought I was going to die. Broke out in cold sweat, had cramps and finally threw up within 3 hours of taking 2 pills at bed time. Threw the rest away. Will never take again.
customer_reviews.author: p j woods

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy everyone was right who claimed cramps
customer_reviews.text: One star was the lowest, amazon should allow zero star reviews. Took one pill and had severe stomach cramps. There is no return policy on these, guessing for a reason. Cancelled prime account due to this being a known product with issue and amazon still allowing it to be sold. Reporting this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only buy these if you're a pill taker or painful toilet experiences
customer_reviews.text: Oh my.... DO NOT BUY THESE PILLS IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR GENTLE PILLS. These are extremely strong. I took 3 of these pills which is the recommended dose for adults, and woke up twice with a bad stomach. The feeling of having diarrhea didn't go away even after 30 minutes of using the bathroom. I had to hope everything cleared out and left still feeling constipated. If you're going to buy these pills, clear out an entire day because you will need it. These pills are very powerful; too powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done
customer_reviews.text: These are the best laxatives I've ever used. No stomach cramps, just smooth sailing. They get the job done within the time frame. Just expect to have to run to the bathroom a lot once they kick in.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!! Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only gave this review a star because I had to. These are not real Dulcolax. Do not buy these fake pills. There’s a reason you cannot return this product...IT IS FAKE!!! I have reported this to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: wishkiss7

customer_reviews.title: Not actual product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Dulcolax physically in store many times, and never had trouble. The product I received in the mail 1: didn’t look the same... But I figured I’d try it anyways, even after all the bad reviews. DON’T DO IT. 2: It is continuous cramping, little spurts of diarrhea, and more cramping and feeling as though you have to poo but can’t really. Not worth it. Some weird sh*t is going on here
customer_reviews.author: Zaida

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY if you Compare PRICES❣️
customer_reviews.text: Works just GREAT❣️ Not hard on your stomach & a lot less expensive than bought in the stores❣️ Great for. When I have to travel or just a short term problem. Good to have on hand ❣️
customer_reviews.author: MIMMAW CAROL

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These work. Sometimes my stomach does hurt but I must admit it does the job and instantly seen the results within days. I recommend these for people struggling with their metabolism or work out constantly but cant seem to Get rid of that last little bit that's tough to Get rid of. Don't take em at work please you will not be comfortable. And don't over do it. Excercise as well and eat a little healthier and you will see a difference. If you still eat like a slob then you will be wasting your time. I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Chillingblowingas

customer_reviews.title: Felt great
customer_reviews.text: That dump was off the chain man Litty Just take 1
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Schedule your colonoscopy today! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Used this as part as the fun colonoscopy prep before the procedure. Worked great. No cramping or extreme unpleasantness. The key is to start eating lighter a day or two before the prep. If you have a family history or if things aren’t going great down there - speak to your doctor about scheduling a colonoscopy. It’s easier than cancer. Also, you get a fun nappy nap drug, only to wake up to buttered toast and ginger ale. Not the worse day you can have. *Originally went to my local Walmart to purchase but as they once again were out of stock on a simple everyday item-I turned to Amazon. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works with Sid effects
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works but makes me very sick every time Ibtakr it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanee Snipes

customer_reviews.title: Great product that is effective
customer_reviews.text: For me this works better than mirlax or other types. It says to take it right before bed time, i usually take it then go to bed cpl hours later. Worth the price. And the next day/morn you will have a pleasant passing of your bowel.s It's gentle. Doesn't hurt etc. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Colon is reborn
customer_reviews.text: It’s like the devil himself is cleaning my colon out. Like the other comments, this is reliably one of the best laxatives I’ve used because I am looking to empty my colon, which is why I gave it 5 stars instead of 1. Use this if you are not weak and want a squeaky clean born again large intestine. Best to use it if you have the time to be committed to the cleanse, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes you sick!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not gentle at all! It makes you feel like you have the stomach flu ! Yes it does what it’s meant to, but in the most aggressive and uncomfortable way. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: aladinsan

customer_reviews.title: STOP! Read Please!
customer_reviews.text: The super tiny pill with a big punch! I encourage everyone to use *caution* when dosing. The directions said 1-3 so I took 2... Within about 6 hours I was in the bathroom questioning my decision as my guts twisted something awful! I will personally start with one and work my way up in dosing IF need be in the future and I strongly encourage you to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like purple. Mmmmm
customer_reviews.text: These are the wrong pills. Totally my fault. Might stick these in the boss' coffee
customer_reviews.author: BMXmike78

customer_reviews.title: Dulcolax overnight tablets lot 761114. Exp. Sep. 20. Should be recalled.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Dulcolax off and on for a few years, and never had any issues. For some reason this package of 100 tablets that I ordered are inactive, like taking nothing. I usually just take 2 and I have been doing that every day now for 4 days and absolutely nothing. I took 3 last night and still nothing!!! Maybe some lack of quality control. I’m going to call them. UPDATE- I purchased another box from a local pharmacy, and results were normal as usual. Lot 761114. Exp. Sep. 20. Should be recalled and double checked. This is not Amazons fault of course.
customer_reviews.author: SOFI

customer_reviews.title: They now have diff varieties (less potent ones than this)
customer_reviews.text: These are the potent ones. Look at their other products if you want something less potent. They have a whole new "line" of products. Wish I had bought the "hydrating" ones instead, since I don't need something this strong.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Jen-Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I will say this did work but I had many problems. Pros: - •for me worked in about 1 1/2-2 hours • did help my constipation Cons: - • became nauseous about 30mins-1hr after taking it • made my stomach cramps go from 3 to 8, so definitely not “gentle” like it says • caused explosive diarrhea • caused my heartbeat to race in the 100s when I was doing the simplest things like going to get water, btw I don’t have any heart problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of taking 5 of these because I take 2 ex lax which are 25mg And these are 5mg tablets.... Big mistake... huge. I now only take 2 to get the job done. Sorry butt, I over estimated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Although it does facilitate my bowel movement, I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it does facilitate my bowel movement, I don't find the product "gentle". It makes my bowel movement come very suddenly/quickly, with minor stomach pain.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoxi

customer_reviews.title: It works, with little to no side effects
customer_reviews.text: When I read the mixed reviews, I was a little concerned. I ended up taking 4 in one day (not intentional, but let's not talk about it haha). I didn't experience vomiting or diarrhea and the cramping was minor. Once they worked, I felt just as energetic and was able to go about my day. I'm a relatively short female student athlete. I was able to work out with my teammates after taking these.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not gentle at all.
customer_reviews.text: Causes awful cramps that woke me in the middle of the night.

customer_reviews.title: This REALLY works... but expect to be nauseous for at least 12 hrs

These were very gentle and I take over night as directed. wake up and within the first few hours I do admit I will have to go multiple times, but I believe it's just reassuring everything gets out. Very good product

customer_reviews.title: which is good. Nothing worse than sticking a pill in your ...
customer_reviews.text: No taste, which is good. Nothing worse than sticking a pill in your mouth and having it dissolve before you can swallow it. Then you get a foul taste for hours. This coating works well in and out of your stomach. The coating itself doesn't have a lot of taste, and the pills work really well. If a laxative is what you are looking for, then look no further. This will do the trick,but not so fast it is uncomfortable. Some laxatives cause bloating or other problems, but this one just makes things easier.

product_meta.title: Dulcolax Laxative Tablets, 100 Count, Gentle, Reliable Overnight Relief from Constipation, Hard, Dry, Painful Stools, and Irregular Bowel Movements, Stimulates Bowel to Encourage Movement
product_meta.description: Size:100 Count (Pack of 1)Dulcolax Laxative Tablets, 100 Count Dulcolax Laxative Tablets contain a clinically proven ingredient to relieve occasional constipation and irregularity overnight, so you can feel like yourself in the morning. The comfort-coated tablets are easy to swallow and gentle on your stomach, yet strong enough to provide predictable overnight relief. Take Dulcolax Laxative Tablets before bedtime to allow product 6 to 12 hours to work. Dulcolax Laxative Tablets are designed to stimulate the intestines with the active ingredient bisacodyl, to help relieve occasional constipation. The tablets are coated to prevent the active ingredient from being released until it reaches the part of the intestines where it is needed to work. So, you can trust Dulcolax for gentle, and effective relief of constipation.
feature_bullets: GENTLE, OVERNIGHT RELIEF: Constipation and irregular bowel movements can be painful and uncomfortable. Dulcolax Laxative Tablets provide reliable and predictable overnight relief by gently stimulating the intestines to encourage a morning bowel movement.

CONSTIPATION RELIEF: Constipation is caused by many things, including low fiber diets, dehydration, pregnancy, medication, stress, or aging. Dulcolax & DucloEase are suitable for relief in most cases, but always discuss health concerns with your doctor.

DULCOLAX BRINGS GENTLE RELIEF: With a line of DulcoEase stool softeners, Ducolax laxative tablets, & Ducolax laxative suppositories & applicators, Dulcolax brings you gentle, reliable relief from constipation, hard dry stools, & irregular bowel movements.

A WELL ROUNDED MEDICINE CABINET: When you or a family member is in pain, sick, hurt, or just generally feeling under the weather, you don’t want to run to the pharmacy. A well stocked home medicine cabinet helps ensure relief is at hand when you need it.

PAIN RELIEF: Dulcolax tablets provide quick pain relief for constipation & stomach aches for all ages. Try our fast laxative tablets, suppositories & gentle constipation relief pills for stomach treatment.
